name: Fallen Down Eng
description:
Fan francophone de Yandere Simulator ?

La version complète est aussi disponible en français !!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

English is not my mother language so I'm sorry if there are some mistakes or weird sentences. English is not my mother language but I try my best ! ^^'

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Wanna talk about or do a let's play on Fallen Down ?

Sure ! I don't mind as long as you respect those three conditions :

_ Make sure to specify that I'm the Creator of this visual novel

_Add a link to this download page (the one you're currently reading)

_ Send me by email (eeveegfi@gmail.com) what you've done once it's published or mention me with the @Eevee_gfi in Twitter.

Don't worry ! It's not to bash you or to tell you "it's shitty, delete that immediately" ; this is merely to be sure that I see everything going around my work. :-)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Great job, Yandere-chan. I guess you're happy.

Once again, you've managed to get rid of a rival in love with your dear senpai.

I knew you were able to do it. Told you so !

And while I'm at it, I love this strategy of yours to kill not only girls, but also boys. I totally approve.

I already know this poor Shun Hyoga went through Something similar to what Najimi-san or Sunobu-san have been through.

But… I'm afraid your senpai is a kind of a Don Juan because another is falling into his charms and senpai is into hers.

And Something tells me you won't be able to eliminate her as easily as the previous rivals...

What ? Her name ?

Well… How to say this…

Say, Ayano, I know socializing isn't your hobby but have you ever heard of a girl named…
